_source.short_desc: Power your content with award-winning DAM, PIM, MRM, and brand management solutions with service beyond compare.
_source.long_desc: Widen, an Acquia Company, and maker of the award-winning digital asset management (DAM) platform, the Widen Collective, is recognized by Capterra users for Best Value and Best Ease of Use. Widen provides a central source for product content and brand assets. Primarily serving mid-to-large companies of 500+ employees, Widen's cloud-based solutions for enterprise DAM and PIM, marketing workflow, and brand management deliver high-quality software and unparalleled service.
_source.target_audience: Medium-to-large businesses with a marketing focus. Key verticals: Manufacturing, Consumer Products, Food & Beverage, Apparel & Fashion, Healthcare & Medical Tech, Hospitality, Education, Agencies.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Design and publish anything in a few clicks. From brochure to video, access thousands of templates, images, videos, and more for free.
related_products.features: Design isn't just for designers. It's for anyone with ideas to share. Canva is the online platform that makes designing anything easy, for every individual and team. With thousands of professionally made templates to get you started, you can create, customize, and share your designs in a few clicks. From stickers to professional brochures, stunning videos to workplace presentations, it's never been easier to achieve your design goals.

related_products.short_desc: Collaborate in real time with comments, easily find your latest versions, automate approval workflows, and securely manage work from an
related_products.features: Box provides a secure, one-stop shop for all of your digital assets. Collaborate in real time with comments, easily finds your latest versions, automate approval workflows, and manage work from anywhere. What's more, you can share with outside agency partners while your IP stays protected.

related_products.short_desc: Airtable combines an intuitive spreadsheet interface with file attachments, kanban boards, calendars, and other powerful features.
related_products.features: Airtable is the all-in-one collaboration platform that combines the flexibility of a spreadsheet interface with rich features like file attachments, kanban card stacks, calendars, and reporting.

related_products.short_desc: Centralize and share your teams brand assets using cloud-based Canto Digital Asset Management and start working more efficiently today.
related_products.features: As a leader in digital asset management (DAM), Canto is the simplest, yet most powerful DAM system on the market. Marketing teams across all industries trust Canto to organize, secure and share visual brand assets and content with ease. With over 30 years' experience in the digital asset management industry, thousands of brands around the world rely on us to centralize their rich media library.

related_products.short_desc: Brandfolder is the industry-leading, most intuitive Digital Asset Management platform
related_products.features: An industry leader in Digital Asset Management software, Brandfolder delivers a platform that is as intuitive for users as it is powerful for admins, to easily store, manage, share, manipulate, and analyze assets across hundreds of formats including 8K video, documents, images, and 3D renderings. With best-in-class services, support, security, and scalability, Brandfolder helps global brands create compelling, timely, and consistent brand experiences with unparalleled efficiency and speed.

related_products.short_desc: Use lockable design templates to store & protect your brand assets - empowering non-designers to safely design marketing materials.
related_products.features: Marq is the design & brand templating platform that not only stores all your brand assets, but keeps them safe too. Lockable templates ensure your brand fonts, colors, and logos stay locked down while still allowing for small design tweaks & customization. Empower non-designers to create on-brand marketing materials while saving your creative team loads of time using Marq - the brand templating platform trusted by over 7 million users worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: PhotoShelter for Brands is the fastest and easiest digital asset management tool that transforms how creative people work.
related_products.features: PhotoShelter for Brands is a Digital Asset Management system that allows marketing and creative teams to easily store, organize and share content so they can engage audiences in real-time. With this one centralized platform, the 1,200+ brands we serve are able to move creative files from point A to point B instantly. It fits seamlessly into the way they work, connects to tools they use every day through Adobe and API integrations, and gives them full creative control of their visual content.

related_products.short_desc: Enabling marketing teams & ad agencies to effectively manage their creative approval workflow from project brief to approval & archive.
related_products.features: Admation is cloud based approval workflow management software for brands and ad agencies. Streamline your approval workflow with a project management tool that enables you to manage and track all of your reviews and approvals from one central hub. Key features include briefing templates, online proofing tools, batched feedback, tiered approvals, reminder notifications, resource management, project time tracking, reporting tools and digital asset management.

related_products.short_desc: Store, organize and share all your digital files on a customizable platform that provides instant visibility at anytime.
related_products.features: Store, organize and share all your digital files on a customizable platform that provides instant visibility and accessibility at any time. monday marketer enables anyone to easily send any creative to team members within minutes to move the campaign process along faster. Automate status notifications and repetitive processes so you can keep track of all changes and  the most up-to-date version of any asset.

similar_products.short_desc: Bring together everyone who works on your brand - plus all the guidelines, templates, and materials - in a single brand platform.
similar_products.features: Frontify brings together everyone who's working on your brand - plus all the guidelines, templates, and materials they need - in a single brand management platform. With Frontify, you can centralize every brand asset, easily create brand guidelines to organize and showcase your brand, and streamline collaboration across teams. Used by more than 5,000 brands and 650k users, Frontify is where brands live.

similar_products.short_desc: Brandfolder is the industry-leading, most intuitive Digital Asset Management platform
similar_products.features: An industry leader in Digital Asset Management software, Brandfolder delivers a platform that is as intuitive for users as it is powerful for admins, to easily store, manage, share, manipulate, and analyze assets across hundreds of formats including 8K video, documents, images, and 3D renderings. With best-in-class services, support, security, and scalability, Brandfolder helps global brands create compelling, timely, and consistent brand experiences with unparalleled efficiency and speed.

similar_products.short_desc: Bynder's digital asset management platform helps you conquer the chaos of proliferating content. Unite. Create. Thrive.
similar_products.features:
Bynder goes far beyond managing digital assets. Our digital asset management platform enables teams to conquer the chaos of proliferating content, touchpoints, and relationships in order to thrive.

With powerful and intuitive solutions that embrace the way people want to work, and a richly integrated ecosystem, we are the brand ally that unifies and transforms the creation and sharing of assets, inspiring teams, delighting customers, and elevating businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: Centralize and share your teams brand assets using cloud-based Canto Digital Asset Management and start working more efficiently today.
similar_products.features: As a leader in digital asset management (DAM), Canto is the simplest, yet most powerful DAM system on the market. Marketing teams across all industries trust Canto to organize, secure and share visual brand assets and content with ease. With over 30 years' experience in the digital asset management industry, thousands of brands around the world rely on us to centralize their rich media library.

similar_products.short_desc: MediaValet helps Marketing and Creative teams easily manage, collaborate on and distribute their marketing assets, visuals and content.
similar_products.features:
As the only DAM built on Microsoft Azure, MediaValet is the fastest and easiest to use  DAM platform, offering unlimited users, unlimited support and training as well as best-in-class integrations to technology and marketing platforms.

MediaValet, a leader in cloud-based digital asset management, helps marketing and creative teams easily manage, collaborate on and distribute their digital assets and content, improving productivity and increasing the ROI on their marketing investments.

similar_products.short_desc: Dash - affordable Digital Asset Management (DAM) tool for marketers in growing brands. Built for SMBs, start from just $74/#49 a month.
similar_products.features:
Dash - affordable, fast, easy to use digital asset management (DAM) for growing brands and small businesses. Beautiful UX, transparent pricing, best ROI and excellent support mean it's easy to get up and running with Dash. 
 
Store all your images and videos in one place. Organise and find files fast with AI auto-tags and unlimited custom fields. Collaborate with team or external partners easily - share collections, approve content, control user access.

From $74/#49 monthly. 14-day free trial.

similar_products.short_desc: TwicPics is a web image optimization solution. Automatic context-driven resizing, cutting-edge optimizations and CDN delivery.
similar_products.features:
Delegating your web image management to TwicPics makes all the best practices of responsive images accessible with just a few lines of code. TwicPics takes care of everything, from automatic context-driven resizing and cutting-edge optimizations to the delivery from a global CDN. Reconciling high-quality images with fast pageload speed has never been so easy. 
TwicPics also offers unique features for optimization of short videos.

similar_products.short_desc: Offered as a web or client solution to help you organize, secure and manage your documents no matter your company size.
similar_products.features: Dokmee is a secure, easy to use document management system for efficient document capture and storage, search and retrieval, and file sharing; all at an attractive price point. Dokmee adapts to any business model and is the result of cutting edge technology developed to ensure efficient, streamlined productivity and profitability. Dokmee may be quickly and effortlessly integrated into any size company across multiple industries.

similar_products.short_desc: Intuitive Digital Asset Management solutions by Imagen. From content ingestion, approval, archiving - cloud-native and secure.
similar_products.features: Imagen's smart and intuitive DAM platforms remove the hassle of day to day digital file management and unlock the full value of your assets. Bring your content and your colleagues together so you can work more effectively and achieve your business goals. Our intelligent AI-powered DAM platforms put you in complete control of your media. Book your free demo today to find out why leading brands - including BP, IMG and BBC - trust us with their digital assets and brand guidelines.

similar_products.short_desc: Use Marvia's Digital Asset Management to stop wasting time and produce more content, without hiring more designers and marketers.
similar_products.features: Leading brands use Marvia's Digital Asset Management to save time and resources, shorten time to market and increase brand consistency across all partners and channels. Whatever the size of your organization, stop wasting time and produce more content, without hiring more designers and marketers. Organize, customize and distribute your marketing content with ease and maximize results with Marvia.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Brand Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Brand Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Brand Management software includes a variety of tools for creating, compiling, updating and storing product information. Among many functions of such software are ad building, requirements management, product material distribution and communications management. For related software see: Marketing Automation software and Digital Asset Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Document Management software automates the process of managing documents from creation to storage to distribution throughout an enterprise, increasing efficiency and reducing the cost and clutter of maintaining paper records. Document Management applications provide solutions for a wide range of document needs from low specificity, high volume items such as standard forms to highly specific, low volume items such as one-to-one correspondence. Document Management software is related to Digital IT Asset Management software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

Dropbox Business is a digital workplace trusted by over 300,000 business teams worldwide and over 50% of the Fortune 500 for its industry leading file sync, collaboration, and extensive administration and security features that scale as teams grow.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your content lifecycle with flexible retention schedules, preservation for defensible discovery, and disposition management.
related_products.features: Upgrade your information governance strategy with the in-place lifecycle management your organization needs to reduce risk without impacting productivity. Streamline how you manage the lifecycle of the content that powers business processes with flexible retention schedules, preservation for defensible discovery, and disposition management.

related_products.short_desc: monday.com Work OS enables easy creation, centralizing, tracking, and automation of all document processes in your organization.
related_products.features: With monday.com Work OS you can create, store, and manage all documents and forms in one place. Automate document creation and approvals to increase efficiency and minimize error, share and collaborate on documents in real-time, and maximize security by centralizing them in one place. Track and review past edits through document search, and standardize document processes to keep everyone on your team on the same page. monday allows for efficient document management, in a collaborative workspace.

related_products.short_desc: Confluence can be your single source of truth. Use this tool to efficiently store and share information across your whole organization.
related_products.features: Organizations are getting increasingly digital. Gone are the days where we would keep paper files on important documents. Join the digital movement by making Confluence your one Document Management software tool. Become more efficient by building a single source of truth and distributing important information across your organization, with one click.

related_products.short_desc: Work off the latest documents every time. Autodesk Takeoff is built on a cloud-based platform that updates in real time.
related_products.features: Collaborate confidently knowing you have access to the latest documents and data whenever you need them. Get simplified access to relevant construction documents, drawings, and 3D models. Autodesk Takeoff updates files in real time so you can stay on top of the latest versions of everything and work from a single source of truth.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a collaboration software used for document management with visual proofing, real-time collaboration, and Kanban boards.
related_products.features: Wrike is a work management software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Streamline your document management with cloud-based, in-context file storage. Share documents within custom request forms and tasks, shorten your approval cycles with visual proofing, and quickly tag teammates for any file requests. Accelerate your delivery with Wrike's 400+ integrations, including other document management software. Documents are easy-to-find and task discussions and updates can be seen in seconds.

related_products.short_desc: eFileCabinet's advanced workflow automation helps growing organizations limited by repetitive tasks maximize their revenue potential.
related_products.features: eFileCabinet is the ultimate document management solution that empowers HR, Finance, and more to focus on business outcomes. Our cloud-based solution can automate complex document processes that prevent midsize organizations from maximizing their revenue potential. eFileCabinet provides a secure, centralized location for each department to access their confidential data and reduce interdepartmental silos. Streamline your day with eFileCabinet and give 100% of focus to the work that matters.

related_products.short_desc: Sales teams use PandaDoc to improve deal workflow, insights, and speed while delivering an amazing buying experience.
related_products.features:
PandaDoc has empowered sales teams to improve deal workflow, insights, and speed while delivering an amazing buying experience.

Over 40,000 customers use PandaDocs all-in-one document automation software to streamline the process to create, approve, and eSign proposals, quotes, and contracts.  PandaDoc helps you simplify processes and increase efficiency across the entire organization when you integrate your existing CRM, payment, and file storage apps into a single workflow.

related_products.short_desc: Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams.
related_products.features:
Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams. We help teams share their core processes, then transform them into powerful no-code workflows.

Start with employee onboarding to set up new hires for success, then build all sorts of workflows like employee onboarding, client onboarding, and tenant screening.

Manage your team wiki and company handbook 100% free.

Join Salesforce, Colliers, Drift, and 3,000+ other businesses who use Process Street today.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is a free document management platform used by over 8 million businesses worldwide. Available in cloud and on-premise.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is a free document management platform used by over 8 million businesses worldwide. Available in cloud and on-premise (open source code access). Personal, group and company drive, file sync, file sharing, mobile access, online and offline document editing, multiuser editing, more.

similar_products.short_desc: DocuPhase simplifies document scanning, storage, retrieval, and archival processes for small to enterprise organizations.
similar_products.features:
DocuPhase's document management solution is ideal for organizations of all sizes, from small to enterprise organizations.

DocuPhase simplifies document scanning, storage, retrieval, and archival processes and is highly configurable to create the ideal solution for your company's unique needs. 

Eliminate repetitive tasks, digitize your archival and retrieval processes, and eliminate manual tasks that often involve time-consuming bottlenecks and paper shuffling.

similar_products.features: eFileCabinet is the ultimate document management solution that empowers HR, Finance, and more to focus on business outcomes. Our cloud-based solution can automate complex document processes that prevent midsize organizations from maximizing their revenue potential. eFileCabinet provides a secure, centralized location for each department to access their confidential data and reduce interdepartmental silos. Streamline your day with eFileCabinet and give 100% of focus to the work that matters.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage, share, and collaborate on business files. Offers granular control of data, role-based permissions and mobile access.
similar_products.features: Onehub is the best way to manage, share and collaborate on business files. Designed for business needs, Onehub offers granular control of data, role-based permissions and mobile access. The Onehub platform is intuitive and easy to use, so customers can begin controlled sharing of documents in minutes. Onehub's proven solution is used by more than one million users worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Engineering content management solution that enables flexible revision management and workflow support for projects & single documents.
similar_products.features: Engineering content management solution that enables flexible revision management and workflow support for projects & single documents.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho WorkDrive is secure document management software empowering modern teams to store, edit, share, and manage documents from a centra
similar_products.features: Create a central team workspace and cloud library for your entire organization with Zoho WorkDrive. Assign role-based access to your team members and enable them to store, share, and collaborate on documents securely. WorkDrive's modern interface offers a built-in office suite and advanced data security and management capabilities.

similar_products.short_desc: Conga's document generation software ensures creation, delivery, and storage of documents, driving revenue success and growth.
similar_products.features:
Conga document generation solutions are the go-to for creating beautiful, accurate digital documents using pre-built or customized templates auto-populated with data from Salesforce. Send consistent and personalized documents that elevate your brand and delight your customers.

No matter your industry, your role, or your use case, Conga document generation makes it easy to quickly generate error-free documents and automate processes. Get rid of process roadblocks to accelerate business revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: Practice management for accountants with expense tracking, staff time reporting, cash receipts handling, and client management tools.
similar_products.features: Time and billing software that offers expense tracking, staff time reporting, cash receipts handling, and client management tools.

similar_products.features:
ICM's ViewCenter is a secure digital environment where your business-critical documents live, and your important processes can be optimized. Get a quick ROI with powerful search functions, secure file sharing, compliance, tasks & alerts, electronic forms, scanning/data capture, integrations, and so much more.

Whether a small business or large corporation, ViewCenter is cost-effective and scalable...ICM's Customer Success Team will find the right solution for YOUR digital transformation goals.

similar_products.short_desc: OM Plus Delivery Manager is an advanced, intelligent print spooler management software.
similar_products.features: OM Plus Delivery Manager is an advanced, intelligent print management software. Delivery Manager seamlessly ingests jobs from multiple systems and delivers them to printers, multi-function devices, fax software, email systems, and more. Rarely changes are needed to existing ERP/EMR systems. OM Plus print spooler management software features include print confirmation, re-printing, re-routing, automated failover, load balancing, bundling, re-sequencing, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: SimpleFile is a mobile-app software solution that enables attorneys and clients to communicate better, review files faster, and more.
similar_products.features: SimpleFile simplifies the attorney, client relationship. It's the first-of-its-kind mobile app for attorneys and legal professionals to use with their clients. It simplifies communication and helps you manage your cases from anywhere. It's the fastest, most effective way to inform your clients of their case status, files, updates and more. You'll never have to chase down client emails, text messages or take unnecessary calls. Everything is right in the app.

similar_products.short_desc: monday.com Work OS enables easy creation, centralizing, tracking, and automation of all document processes in your organization.
similar_products.features: With monday.com Work OS you can create, store, and manage all documents and forms in one place. Automate document creation and approvals to increase efficiency and minimize error, share and collaborate on documents in real-time, and maximize security by centralizing them in one place. Track and review past edits through document search, and standardize document processes to keep everyone on your team on the same page. monday allows for efficient document management, in a collaborative workspace.

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on document management for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.

Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

similar_products.short_desc: A small-business digital filing system to store, find, & manage digital documents, with the best multi-document scanning for the price.
similar_products.features: DigitalDrawer is Windows-based, on-premise, small-business (3-5 users) digital filing software used in various industries, such as retail, manufacturing, realty, finance, education, etc. Businesses use it to electronically and securely store, organize, find, and manage documents. Customers choose DigitalDrawer to keep documents in-house and because of its low price tag, the best Multi-Document Scanning/Importing for the price, robust security, and a full array of document management functions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Digital Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Digital Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Digital Asset Management software automates the management of images and other non-textual materials. Digital Asset Management applications enable powerful, flexible solutions for developing, organizing, and distributing digital assets across multiple office locations and business sectors. These solutions ensure optimal usage for an organization's rich media assets such as advertising pieces, product images, sales collateral, audio, and video files. Digital Asset Management software is related to Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Entity Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Entity Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Entity Management software and related services enable organizations to maintain a searchable and easily accessible repository of records of one or more legal formations under their control.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Forms Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Forms Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Asset Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Asset Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Asset Management software provides enterprise wide inventory and life cycle management of software and hardware assets. This can include asset maintenance history, user permissions, acquisition budget forecasting, and software license compliance. This type of software enables IT managers to improve cost control and accurately track IT's business value throughout the organization. IT Asset Management software is related to Compliance software, License Management software, and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Knowledge Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Knowledge Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Knowledge Management software offers ways to optimize the utility of intellectual capital and intangible assets by capturing, preserving and organizing institutional knowledge in a measurable format. Knowledge Management solutions allow successful strategies to be transferred and replicated throughout an organization. Implementation can be inwardly focused on faster learning, new knowledge creation, and innovation or directed outwardly, providing a self-guided service path for customers. Knowledge Management software is related to Business Intelligence software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Document Management software allows legal professionals to organize and quickly access electronically-stored legal documents. Scanning, imaging, and merging allow these documents to be included in a database that is searchable and sortable in any number of ways. This type of software can also allow for transcript and transcription management. Legal Document Management software is related to Document Management software, Legal Case Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Court Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Proposal Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Proposal Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Proposal Management software helps companies manage the proposal and RFP process. Bidders may quickly create strong business proposals and responses to RFPs that are tailored to the needs of each proposal. This software is helpful in automating the more cumbersome aspects of proposal writing while maintaining a detailed and professional-looking document. Some Proposal Management software is also a good fit for companies that are soliciting proposals. In this case, the software helps to organize and evaluate various aspects of multiple proposals at once. Proposal Management software is related to Quoting software, Contract Management software, and Professional Services Automation software.
